Package uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.util

Provides general MEKON utility classes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    KUpdateListener
    General listener for any type of update operation.
    KValuesListener<V>
    Listener for specific updates to a value-list.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    KCollectionMap<K,E>
    Map whose values are collections of some specific type.
    KFileStore
    Provides read/write access to an on-disk file-store, within which the files are assigned auto-generated names, based on common prefixes and suffixes and individual file-specific indexes.
    KIndexes<E>
    Manages the assignment of unique indexes to a set of entities.
    KKeyedList<K,V>
    Abstract class whose extensions represent ordered lists, with element value-types that enable each value to be mapped to an associated "key" object, and where the key object can be retrieved via the value object itself.
    KLabel
    Utility class that heuristically converts concept-names or property-names, which may be in "camel-back" notation, into versions that are hopefully suitable for being displayed to an end-user.
    KList<V>
    Base-class for classes that represent ordered lists whose update-operations can be listened to.
    KListMap<K,E>
    Map whose values are lists.
    KSetMap<K,E>
    Map whose values are sets.
    KSimpleList<V>
    Simple concrete extension of KList.
    KSingleton<S>
    Supplies a singleton object that is initially created and registered via the static initialisation method an "initialisation class".

Package uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.util Description

Provides general MEKON utility classes.
